root.message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 1-3-1b, translated into all languages

languages.language: The raw data that ASPIRE uses to estimate SPL performance indicators are already validated and curated by the NSOs. Data with harmonized welfares aggregates are produced and validated by the World Bank’s Poverty and Equity practice based on their own standards. Furthermore, ASPIRE team ensures the quality of performance indicators following the process described above (see 4.d. Validation).
